sentences.en: A woman holding title a duchy in her own right.
sentences.cn: 凭本身的头衔持有子爵称号的贵妇人.

sentences.en: Henry VIII decided to dispark the Duchy parks and turn them more profitably into pasture.
sentences.cn: 亨利八世决定开放若干公爵猎园,把它们改作更加有益的牧场.

sentences.en: In 1987 awarded the Grand Duchy of Luxembourg to accept the Order of the Crown.
sentences.cn: 1987年接受卢森堡大公授予的皇冠勋章.

sentences.en: The Grand Duchy appeared in the feudal separation period during middle ages in Europe.
sentences.cn: 大公国出现于欧洲中世纪封建割据时期.

sentences.en: The region a duchy in 1806 and was absorbed by Prussia in 1866.
sentences.cn: 该地区在1806年成为领地并于1866年被普鲁士接收.

words.tran_cn: 公爵的；公爵领地的；象公爵的
公爵夫人；女公爵；雍容华贵的妇女；小老板娘
